Summary: Two Flashing UFO's hovering above Ag.Dimitrios - Athens
divs: sighting detailsi was walking on pileos str. in ag.dimitrios in athens-greece and i saw 2 bright flashing \pulsating ufo's, south -southeast from me. they were changing colors, formation and directions. they were also dissapeared and re-appeared several times. i was wathcing them for 10 minutes. i called some friends to ask if they saw them too, but no luck. after 10 minutes they just light off and vanished without a trace.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around September 24th 2012
